data.description:
Avatar Video Recording and Live Streaming

Turn  your Meta Quest into a Avatar Content Creation Studio.
Record video to share / edit later, or livestream to YouTube and Twitch directly from your Quest.  Great for VTubing!

All from your Meta Quest 2, 3, or Pro!  No complicated PC / Phone / Tracker setup needed.

Record Video from a third person to tell your story.  Includes settings to make editing your video simple and painless.

Stream to many platforms including:  YouTube, Twitch, Tik Tok, or anything with RTMP support.

Optional casting to and from OBS Studio for extra functionality.

Supports several Avatar formats including VRM, Ready Player Me, and Meta.

Optional full body tracking with supported motion capture hardware including:  Mocopi, Persepction Neuron, OptiTrack

changelog.change_log: Fixed many small blendshape bugs, menu will reset position at app start.  360 background can be toggled to be seen in the VR view.
Adjusted chat to work way more consistently
v1.3 with new casting to OBS features and camera aiming fixes
Updated execution order to ensure shapes sliders work

Version 1.2 of VStreamer Live has now released!




New Sketchfab support.  Now you can download scenes and props!

360 image capture support to make backgrounds of your current scene.

Streaming can now be set to different resolutions.

There is a new SHAPES section to AVATAR.  This lets you adjust any blendshape your VRM avatar may have.

Better video/audio sync in video recordings.

Better performance overall.

IOBT (Inside Out Body Tracking) now available.  You can find it in Avatar Settings.

Tongue Tracking enabled on Quest Pro.

VRC Blendshapes now supported on VRM models.

Share setting expanded.
Now includes a camera layout feature to place your avatar anywhere in the screen.  Also includes a new first person cam mode to show how you use VStreamer Live.

There is a new SHARE area to VStreamer Live!  This makes it possible to upload video content directly to any online platform like YouTube, Tik Tok, etc.  We'll be expanding the functionality as we continue production.  

We've also added the content browser.  Go to https://VStreamer.Live/webportal on your PC or smartphone browser when running VStreamer Live to try it out.  You can even fill in your stream key credentials.  No more typing 60 characters in VR XD

Happy VStreaming!

VStreamer Live ver 1.1

Includes:
Fixed VR keyboards with a clear button
Revamped video player that no longer stutters
Video list is now updated and organized
Streaming performance SIGNIFICATLY improved
Fixed WebRTC mode to work with Vulkan for better performance
YouTube and Twitch chat NO LONGER need api keys
Updated Oculus SDK to v59 for body tracking.
Updated mocopi integration
Perception Neuron SDK updated.  Next update will unlock the rest.
Avatar sorting improved
Documentation link added to dock

Streaming no longer crashes app when headset goes to sleep.  Web browser no longer disables audio.  Subscriptions now unlock features properly.  Thank you for your patience.  We're a very small team !^_^
Fixed issue with backspace no longer functioning.
